mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN.ENTRBOARD ( EBOARD_NO, CGORY_NO, GUBUN_NO, EMP_ID, CALD_ID, EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_CONTENT, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE, EBOARD_DELFLAG ) VALUES ( ENTRYBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '302', '300', #{emp_id}, (SELECT MAX(CALD_ID)+1 FROM CALENDAR), #{emp_name}, #{eboard_title}, #{eboard_content}, 0, CURRENT_DATE, 'N' )

INSERT INTO ADMIN.ENTRBOARD ( EBOARD_NO, CGORY_NO, GUBUN_NO, EMP_ID, CALD_ID, EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_CONTENT, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE, EBOARD_DELFLAG ) VALUES ( ENTRYBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '301', '300', #{emp_id}, (SELECT MAX(CALD_ID)+1 FROM CALENDAR), (SELECT EMP_ID FROM ADMIN.EMP WHERE EMP_ID=#{emp_id}), #{eboard_title}, #{eboard_content}, 0, CURRENT_DATE , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT CALD_ID , EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , EBOARD_TITLE , EBOARD_CONTENT, CALD_START, CALD_END, EBOARD_DELFLAG, NVL(CALD_COLOR,'#f36B6B') AS CALD_COLOR FROM ADMIN.ENTRBOARD e LEFT JOIN ADMIN.CALENDAR c USING(CALD_ID) WHERE GUBUN_NO = 300 AND EMP_ID = #{emp_id} AND EBOARD_DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ADMIN.ENTRBOARD e WHERE CALD_ID = #{cald_id}
